text: Mile Perković (11 September 1920 – 2 October 2013) was a notable Yugoslav Partisan, Economist and sports administrator. He was FK Sarajevo president of the assembly when the club won its first Yugoslav First League title in 1967. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2013 deaths Category:People from Sarajevo Category:FK Sarajevo presidents of the assembly Category:University of Sarajevo alumni
title: Mile Perković
